name: Chromanticore
text:
Bestow {2}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, lifelink
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, and lifelink.

name: Chromatic Armor
text:
Enchant creature
As Chromatic Armor enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Chromatic Armor enters the battlefield with a sleight counter on it.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature by sources of the last chosen color.
{X}: Put a sleight counter on Chromatic Armor and choose a color. X is the number of sleight counters on Chromatic Armor.

name: Chromatic Lantern
text:
Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: Dimir mages put the lanterns to good use, creating shapeshifters and sleeper agents from mana foreign to them.
It exemplifies the motto of the Luminary League: "Innovation requires insatiable curiosity and a good source of light."
Dimir mages put the lanterns to good use, creating shapeshifters and sleeper agents from mana foreign to them.

name: Chromatic Sphere
text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"Let insight and energy be your guides."
—The Blind Seer, to Gerrard

"As expected, this sphere's design reflects the colors of the four moons . . . plus another?"
—Pontifex, elder researcher

name: Chromatic Star
text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Star: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
When Chromatic Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"This item is not from . . . now. It reflects a sky no longer ours and gleams with hope that does not exist."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Chrome Mox
text:
Imprint — When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand.
{T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors to your mana pool.

name: Chromescale Drake
text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Flying
When Chromescale Drake enters the battlefield, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all artifact cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

name: Chromeshell Crab
text:
Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Chromeshell Crab is turned face up, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls.

name: Chrome Steed
text: Metalcraft — Chrome Steed gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

editions.flavor: According to Auriok myth, it collects scrap in order to reassemble its lost rider.

name: Chromium
text:
Flying
Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Chromium unless you pay {W}{U}{B}.

name: Chronatog
text: {0}: Chronatog gets +3/+3 until end of turn. You skip your next turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

editions.flavor: For the chronatog, there is no meal like the present.

text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{0}: Draw three cards. You skip your next turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

editions.flavor: VI Prize Avatar

{0}: Chronatog Totem gets +3/+3 until end of turn. You skip your next turn. Activate this ability only once each turn and only if Chronatog Totem is a creature.

name: Chronic Flooding
text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

editions.flavor: With the Izzet occupied elsewhere, many of their public works fell into disrepair.

name: Chronicler of Heroes
text: When Chronicler of Heroes enters the battlefield, draw a card if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

editions.flavor: She paints pictures with words, though not all pictures show the truth.

name: Chronomantic Escape
text:
Until your next turn, creatures can't attack you. Exile Chronomantic Escape with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3—{2}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Chronomaton
text: {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Chronomaton.

editions.flavor: On the third night, the villagers destroyed their clocks. The sounds of whirring gears and chiming metal held only dread for them.
On the third night, the villagers destroyed their clocks. The sounds of whirring gears and chiming metal held only dread for them.

name: Chronosavant
text: {1}{W}: Return Chronosavant from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. You skip your next turn.

editions.flavor: "In my dreams, I hear the voices of my future selves who have died in times yet to come. I use that knowledge to avoid those dark futures and continue my search for peace."

name: Chronostutter
text: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top.

editions.flavor: Timing is everything.

name: Chronozoa
text:
Flying
Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Chronozoa dies, if it had no time counters on it, create two tokens that are copies of it.

name: Chub Toad

editions.flavor:

At the door.

Or you'll run no more."

editions.flavor:

—Empress Llawan

name: Cinder Barrens
text:
Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: A mudflow swallowed the lowlands years ago. All that remains are a bottomless mire and an endless rain of ash.

name: Cinderbones
text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Cinderbones.

editions.flavor: Not all coals lie quietly in their beds of cold ash.

name: Cinder Cloud
text: Destroy target creature. If a white creature dies this way, Cinder Cloud deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.

name: Cinder Crawler
text: {R}: Cinder Crawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Cinder Crawler is blocked.

editions.flavor: The crawler doesn't care what gets in its way. It pushes everything into the boiling muck and waits for the meal to cook.

name: Cinder Elemental

editions.flavor: Their rage can grow to such proportions that they explode in a cloud of fire.
